thread.title: BBDO New York Named Agency Of The Year At Four Major Award Shows

author: cnbc.com
title: BBDO New York Named Agency Of The Year At Four Major Award Shows
text:
NEW YORK, May 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- BBDO New York has been named Agency of the Year at four of the advertising industry's most prominent award shows. These include D&AD, The One Show, Art Director's Club, and Webby Awards (for the second year in a row).
Awards were won for multiple clients and campaigns, and across a broad range of forms and platforms. Gold-winning campaigns at the various shows included:
Bacardi "Music Liberates Music" Downtown Records "Live Looper" GE "You Can't Unring a Bell" M&M's "M&M's & Friends" P&G "The Talk" Sandy Hook Promise "Tomorrow's News" Snickers "Recovery Room"
"Being named Agency of the Year not just once, but four times is a testament to the depth and breadth and the quality of the work we are doing for clients," commented Greg Hahn, Chief Creative Officer, BBDO New York. "It's a sign of the fact that everyone here is on the same mission."
These accolades are in addition to BBDO New York having been named one of Fast Company's Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Marketing and Advertising earlier this year.
David Lubars, Chief Creative Officer at BBDO Worldwide said, "I like to say BBDO is a global boutique. These recognitions show it's not just words."
Along with BBDO New York being named Agency of the Year, BBDO Worldwide was named Network of the Year at the Art Director's Club and The One Show, and BBDO's parent company, Omnicom Group, was the Holding Company of the Year at The One Show.
